licence_overview:
To use automated grading equipment to classify bovine carcases at a slaughterhouse you need a licence from the [Rural Payments Agency (RPA)](http://rpa.defra.gov.uk/rpa/index.nsf/home "Rural Payments Agency"){:rel="external"}.

The operator of the slaughterhouse must apply for the licence.

Once granted you must

* identify the category of carcass
* keep daily control reports on the functioning of the equipment, in particular any problems that you find and actions taken to fix them

*[RPA]: Rural Payments Agency
licence_short_description: Contact the Rural Payments Agency to apply for a licence for automated grading equipment for bovine carcasses in England.
